location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Resident at Bushire to Captain M E Bagnold, Paymaster to the British Troops at Bassidore

physicalDescription.extent: Condition: The item has suffered from pest damage, which has resulted in a small hole in the fabric of the folio that slightly obscures some of the body of the letter.

mods.abstract: The letter is enclosing a bill of lading (not present) for cash being conveyed from Bushire to Bassidore [Bāsaʻīdū] aboard the HC Cruizer Vestal. It further informs the Captain that the Resident will continue to work on negotiating his remaining bills.
